xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 22 April 2014
xwikidoc.content: <vijay13> has quit 05:37 <vijay13> has quit 07:04 <groundnuty> has left #phenotips 08:17 <mcupak> has quit 09:57 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:56 <mcupak> has quit 12:07 <sdumitriu1> akats: Let me know if you run out of things to do 12:41 <akats> ok 12:41 <akats> I do have a question though. Are there any known issues with using components inside Executors? 12:42 <akats> I have a component, which has an Execution object injected 12:42 <akats> I can verify that when I call getContext() on that execution, it gives me context. 12:43 <akats> However, I then call one of the components functions inside an Executor 12:43 <akats> and the XWiki Execution no longer returns a context when I call getContext() 12:59 <akats> Here's a code snippet https://gist.github.com/anonymous/bc0124d58019bf5e497b 13:19 <mcupak> has quit 15:14 <akats> I did end up solving it, but not in a nice way 17:51 <akats> has quit
